description: Dive into "Romantic Escapes in Enchanting Sorrento" — a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Romantic Escapes in Enchanting Sorrento

places.generalDescription: Nestled at the edge of Sorrento, Bagni Regina Giovanna is a captivating destination that combines history with natural beauty. A leisurely 35-40 minute walk leads you to the remnants of an ancient Roman villa, where you'll discover a stunning hidden cove. This secluded spot features a natural archway through which crystal-clear waters flow into a tranquil pool, making it an ideal retreat for those seeking solace away from crowded beaches.

sources.snippet: A great way to get to know any town is to walk it, and to motivate you to pop on your strolling shoes, we're going to let you in on a very special secret at the edge of Sorrento town. After about 35-40 minutes on foot, you'll come to the ruins of an ancient Roman villa, and within its centre is a natural hidden cove, known as Bagni Regina Giovanna, that will provide the dreamiest moments of your trip. Picking your way down the path, taking in the sea views, you'll spot the natural arch in the rocks where cool, clear water floods in to form a dipping pool.
sources.shortName: The Best Travel Tips For a Romantic Break in Sorrento

sources.snippet: This is my personal favorite, as far as romantic spots in Sorrento go. For an unforgettable swim as a couple, I suggest going in late afternoon, climbing down to the small lagoon hidden between the cliffs, and diving right in to the deep turquoise waters. It will be one of the most memorable dips you'll ever take (though perhaps not recommended in winter!).
sources.shortName: The 7 Most Romantic Spots in Sorrento for Couples

places.name: Bagni Regina Giovanna

reviews.text:
A local who lives in the U.S. now recommend this spot to us.  It took a bus and a 15 minute walk, but it was our second best day in Sorrento.  It was busy, but not packed.  A few tourists but a lot of locals.  We felt like locals.  We bought sandwiches in town, wine, and made a day of it.  Highly recommend!

Be respectful and take your trash out.

Beautiful spot. About a 15-minute walk from the bus stop. The path is manageable, but the final steps down to the water can be a bit tricky-especially if you're wearing flip-flops. Overall, definitely worth a visit for a refreshing swim in a unique setting.

Bagni della Regina Giovanna is an interesting spot with beautiful views and a natural swimming pool carved into the rock. The place itself is picturesque and unique. The best way is to take a bus from Sorrento and then walk about 15 minutes to reach the beach. In the high season, it gets very crowded, which makes it hard to fully enjoy. Worth visiting once for the views and history, but not a place I would rush back to.

places.address: Traversa Punta Capo, 80067 Sorrento NA, Italy

places.generalDescription: Villa Comunale di Sorrento is a charming park that resembles a town square and is a popular attraction due to its exotic plantings, seasonal flowers, and large shady trees. The park offers panoramic views of the Bay of Naples, with tourists flocking to capture the endless coastal scenery. Visitors can enjoy sights such as Marina San Francesco, Marina Piccola, Marina Grande, and Mount Vesuvius from the park's railings.

sources.snippet: Villa Comunale is a picturesque park that offers sweeping views of the Bay of Naples and Mount Vesuvius. This park provides an idyllic setting for a marriage proposal with its well-kept gardens, winding paths, and attractive benches. Propose to your significant other during a picnic in the park or while admiring the breathtaking scenery.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Places To Propose In Sorrento

sources.snippet: Villa Comunale is a beautiful garden with seating to enjoy the views. It is located high on the clifftop, over a couple of hundred meters from the sea so that you will have outstanding views. There is also a small bar nearby where you can sit outside and admire the view with a drink.
sources.shortName: Top 20 Things To Do In Sorrento- What To Do And See

sources.snippet: This park is a classically romantic spot, with benches arranged overlooking the sea perfect for a scenic cuddle or getting down on one knee. The only drawback is that the gardens are a very popular destination, so you won't get much privacy.
sources.shortName: The 7 Most Romantic Spots in Sorrento for Couples

places.name: Villa Comunale di Sorrento

reviews.text:
Amazing view of the sea and beaches!
We really loved it.
You can take a beautiful photo and then walk down to the sea and the beaches.
On the way down, you get to enjoy the views of the charming houses in the hills and all the stunning scenery around you.
I've also added a photo of the sunbed and umbrella prices - not cheap, but pretty much the same as everywhere along the Sorrento coast.

This is a small Park with view at the sea. Some Luxury Hotels are located around this Park. Seagulls and other birds are flying and walking around.
It is a calm area for relaxation.
We ate our gelato while appreciating the view. You can see Naples from here too.  We took some photos and went down to see the beach.

places.address: Via S. Francesco, 80067 Sorrento NA, Italy

places.generalDescription: L'Antica Trattoria is a charming restaurant located in the historic heart of Sorrento, offering cozy rooms adorned with vintage decor and a delightful flower-filled terrace. The restaurant provides an intimate and refined dining experience, with captivating and imaginative names for its small rooms. It's a peaceful oasis where guests can savor traditional homemade recipes in an atmosphere of warm and serene intimacy.

sources.snippet: With its Garden Patio surrounded by Lemon trees, L’Antica Trattoria is located in Sorrento Old Town and oozes elegance and romanticism from the moment you arrive. It’s amazing gourmet food is of optimum quality and also uses local and traditional products which provides this restaurant with its amazing reputation. In the evenings you will find a talented and marvellous violinist who often sings traditional and romantic Neapolitan songs to you while you are dining, there’s no better way to describe this experience that purely a scene from a movie.
sources.shortName: The Most Romantic Places in Sorrento to Fall in Love
The Most Romantic Places in Sorrento to Fall in Love

places.name: L'Antica Trattoria

reviews.text: We had an amazing dining experience in Sorrento! The atmosphere was cozy with beautiful seaside views, and the food was absolutely delicious – fresh, authentic, and full of flavor. What made our visit truly special was the exceptional service from our waiter, Masha. She was incredibly kind, attentive, and made us feel genuinely welcome. Masha's recommendations were perfect, and her warm personality added a personal touch to our evening. Highly recommend this place if you're in Sorrento – great food, great views, and outstanding service!

We love pasta. Do you love it too?
Then you absolutely need to visit this place.

This is where my boyfriend and I got goosebumps.
We ordered the lemon pasta, and it was just perfect.
The lemon flavor lingers from the first bite to the last. The pasta was perfectly cooked.
Every dish we had was perfetto!

The gentleman who served us was truly charming, full of laughter, good manners, and smiles. He made our visit to the restaurant unforgettable.
If you're lucky, you might even hear him sing, turning the restaurant into an opera.
Will definitely miss this place.

This place deserves rave reviews. The ambience is absolutely gorgeous. The servers are so personable and polite. The food was so incredible. We felt like VIPs eating lunch there. The price fixe menu was a bit more than we would typically spend on lunch but well worth it. One of our favorite meals during our trip here! Highly recommend!

places.address: Via Padre Reginaldo Giuliani, 33, 80067 Sorrento NA, Italy

places.generalDescription: Chiostro di San Francesco, a serene 14th-century monastery located near Villa Comunale in Sorrento, holds a rich history dating back to ancient settlements and pagan temples. Once an important religious and administrative center, it now hosts classical music concerts and serves as a wedding venue. The nearby Magi House Relais offers various accommodations and amenities just minutes away from the cloister. Visitors can also enjoy the famous local lemon-based liquor, widely used in culinary creations throughout Campania.

sources.snippet: St. Francis’ Cloister is a beautiful cloister and one of Sorrento’s most popular engagement venues. This 14th-century cloister is known for its serene atmosphere and stunning architecture, which includes a gorgeous central garden and a collection of magnificent arches and columns, providing a lovely backdrop for a marriage proposal. Propose to your partner while strolling through the garden and admiring the fragrance of the flowers and the grandeur of the surrounding architecture.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Places To Propose In Sorrento

sources.snippet: Before the Villa Comunale gardens entrance, you’ll find the 14th-century cloister through a small doorway on the right-hand side. This lovely cloister has an Arabic style portico, interlaced arches, and the garden in the middle. In the Spring, you can take amazing photos of the beautiful archways with hanging vines and flowers.
sources.shortName: Top 20 Things To Do In Sorrento- What To Do And See
23 Epic things to do in Sorrento, Italy

places.name: Chiostro di San Francesco

reviews.text:
What an unforgettable place to visit in Sorrento, Italy.
This is a perfect example of what a cloister looks like in Sorrento. A beautiful covered walkway and a gorgeous church with one nave and six chapels. There are many weddings here and the location is amazing.

A gorgeous sanctuary and beautiful place to get married. Hannah & Jordan has an intimate ceremony hidden from the bustling streets before jumping on a boat at the harbour below and speeding off to Positano, I'll never forget how much fun it was to capture!
This was a beautiful and peaceful place to visit in sorrento. I highly recommend it if you like visiting churches and monasteries.

places.address: Via S. Francesco, 12, 80067 Sorrento NA, Italy

reviews.text:
Had the best wine tasting experience here with Fabio! We originally booked another wine tasting experience in Vrasa, but they cancelled last minute which left us with a gap in our day! Thankfully they did, because we randomly found this amazing winery and Fabio hosted a last minute PRIVATE tour for us - absolutely saved our day!
The tour included 7 different wines with a pairing of a selection of different meats and cheese from the freshest butchery! Fabio was very enthusiastic and you could tell how passionate he was about wine! An absolute 5 star experience and I would give more stars if I could.
Thanks again Fabio for saving our day and making the experience very memorable!!

We simply can't recommend this experience enough! We opted for the vineyard experience and it did not disappoint. We had a large group, including some small children, and the hosts/owner treated us just like family. It was such a lovely time exploring the beautiful grounds, vineyards and Roman cisterns from 100 AD. The picnic area for the tasting was absolutely lovely and fully shaded. The wines were fabulous!!! Everyone in our group bought multiple bottles. The food prepared for the pairings was also exquisite. This is a must do experience when in Sorrento!!! Thank you for such a memorable day!

We had an excellent time on this vineyard tour. It was a short 15 minute drive from Sorrento. The land that the vineyard is on is absolutely stunning with spectacular views and a gorgeous garden. Our guide, Ombretta, talked us through how the wine was made and we tasted 6 different wines. They were all delicious and we were given a generous amount and were offered top ups. The food pairings to go with it were delicious too. I would highly recommend this tour to anyone visiting Sorrento!

places.generalDescription: Bagni Delfino is a charming, family-run restaurant that has been a beloved destination in Sorrento for over 50 years. Situated in the picturesque Marina Grande, this restaurant offers a romantic and evocative atmosphere with its terrace overlooking the Gulf of Naples. The Gargiulo family's impeccable service and excellent traditional local cuisine have made it a favorite among locals and visitors alike.

sources.snippet: One tempting reason to get out of the town centre for an evening and wander down to the Marina Grande, is Ristorante Bagni Delfino. Known for serving the best seafood in town, the setting is pretty spectacular too. Sitting on the water, the deck stretches right out over the water, so you can catch a cool breeze while enjoying the panoramic view of Mount Vesuvius and the twinkling lights of the harbour.
sources.shortName: The Best Travel Tips For a Romantic Break in Sorrento

places.name: Bagni Delfino

reviews.text:
Service was the best we experienced in Amalfi coast.
Seafood pastas we had were rich and delicious. Ricotta filled ravioli was fresh and had lovely taste.
Prices are overall higher than in some other places in already expensive Sorrento.

For our last lunch in Sorrento we wanted something on the water and this did the trick. Wonderful setting and views. Service was good throughout, efficient and respectful. Food was tasty and fresh. Ravioli was particularly delicious. Incredible bread, too. We each had a 1/2 bottle of wine from the extensive wine list (although no mentioned glasses of wine).

Bagni Delfino is an absolute gem right in front of Spiaggia di Sorrento. If you truly love seafood, this is your spot. The food is fresh, perfectly prepared, and bursting with flavor - you can taste the quality in every bite. Service is fast without feeling rushed, so you can sit back, relax, and enjoy the moment. Order a bottle of wine, let the pace slow down, and take in the stunning view of Mount Vesuvius. If you stay until nightfall, you'll be rewarded with the sparkling lights of Naples shimmering across the water - an unforgettable sight that makes the whole experience even more magical.

places.address: Via Marina Grande, 216, 80067 Sorrento NA, Italy

places.generalDescription: Puolo Beach is a serene and charming sandy beach situated on the western side of the Sorrentine Peninsula, offering stunning views of lush green hills and crystal-clear waters. It's an ideal spot for a romantic day out or even a marriage proposal. The beach provides a tranquil setting for couples to enjoy a leisurely stroll along the coastal path as the sun sets. The water is clean and safe for children, making it perfect for families as well.

sources.snippet: Puolo Beach, located on the western side of the Sorrentine Peninsula, is a tranquil and picturesque sandy beach ideal for a marriage proposal in Sorrento. With its breathtaking views of verdant green hills and clear waters, this beach provides a relaxing atmosphere for spending a day with your significant other. And as the sun sets, you could take your partner on a romantic stroll along the coastal path or to a secluded spot with breathtaking shore views to propose marriage.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Places To Propose In Sorrento

places.name: Puolo Beach

reviews.text: This restaurant served the best fried mixed fish I've ever had (and I've had lots). The variety of the fish was excellent, I counted at least 7 x types, including prawns, octopus and snapper. The portion almost beat me... you'll not leave the table hungry! The staff are friendly and helpful, even blagging me a 1€ ride back up the hill on the 3 x wheeled chug chug - it is steep and long. The bus ride from Sorrento to the beach costs 1.80€ and takes about 20 minutes. This is a FREE beach, whereas the 'platforms' closer to Sorrento can cost up to 50€ to use.
Off the beaten track beach right near Sorrento for a less touristy atmosphere

Lovely beach, we went just to the right and sat near the rocky cove, water gets deep enough to swim easily. 2 sunbeds and umbrella 30 euros. Top tip would be arrive early, we got there around 11:30 and still plenty of sunbeds so before then would probably get to the front by the sea. We managed to get a TukTuk back up the hill, which was a lifesaver in the heat. That was at 3pm, may be difficult to get if gets busy later.

places.generalDescription: Coku is a gastro-pub with an Asian slant that serves delicious food and drinks. The terrace has an unbeatable view of the Sorrento waterfront, making it a must-visit spot.

sources.snippet: Known for its stunning and romantic terrace, Coku Cocktail Bar is located beside the entrance of La Cocumella Hotel and is one of our favourite hidden spot in Sant’Angello. From sunrise to sunset you can enjoy the beautiful view of the Sorrento Coast and Gulf of Naples from its Sea View Terrace. As well as its Cocktail Bar, Coku also has an amazing Japanese Grill Bar where you can enjoy a delicious meal with your partner over a glass of wine while taking in the magical atmosphere of the stunning location.
sources.shortName: The Most Romantic Places in Sorrento to Fall in Love
The Most Romantic Places in Sorrento to Fall in Love

places.name: Coku - Robata Grill & Cocktail Bar

reviews.text:
We visited here just after sunset and this place is beautiful when lit up. Our waiter was so engaging and recommended us some dishes, my wife had the honey cooked chicken and I had the vegetable tempura. Both were delicious. We stayed for desserts before moving to the bar area for cocktails which were also tasty in a peaceful sea side setting.
We'd recommended if you're staying on this side of Sorrento!

We spent a few nights from our holiday at Cuko for dinner and drinks. The atmosphere and service was 10/10. If you're in the Sorrento area I'd highly recommend trying here. The views for sunset are great. We were looked after by Gennaro and Davide, two gentlemen who made our experience fantastic. We will definitely be back!

I don't even know where to begin…the entire experience was incredible from start to finish! The views, the food, the service, everything was perfect. Our server, Massimo, paired local craft beers with our dinner to perfection. Can't say enough good things about his knowledge of local cuisine and his ability to curate our dinner. Ask for him and you will not be disappointed!

places.address: Corso Marion Crawford, 80065 Sant'Agnello NA, Italy

sources.snippet: Visiting Sorrento and Amalfi Coast with your partner and wondering what the most Romantic places are to visit?. Not only is the Amalfi Coast filled with amazing food, luxury beach clubs and wonderful adventures but it is also one of the most popular wedding and honeymoon destinations in the world.
sources.shortName: 5 Most Romantic Tours in Sorrento & Amalfi Coast in 2025

places.name: Amalfi Coast Tour by Giuseppe De Toro

reviews.text: My husband and I just returned home from a great trip to Sorrento and Rome. Giuseppe was our amazing driver/tour guide while we were in Sorrento. He did our pick up and drop off from the Naples train station and also took us on a magical tour of the Amalfi Coast. Giuseppe was knowledgeable, prompt and happily accommodated my picture requests………..and extra restroom breaks (he knew all the best stops). We are truly so thankful and would recommend him to anyone.

We had an amazing 8hr tour with Giuseppe last September. We wouldn't be able to see places with did without this tour and having a 4 year old with us, it was so comfortable and enough time in each city to explore and avoid crowds everywhere. Giuseppe is very kind, friendly and really helpful, he took us to all instagramable places and made our Almafi Coast visit a truely worthwhile. Would definitely 100% book him again next time in Almafi.  Book this tour and you won't regret it.

My parents really wanted to see the Amalfi Coast during our trip to Sorrento, and at first I had looked at group tours but then ultimately landed on a private Amalfi Coast tour with Giuseppe De Toro. We are so glad we had the day with Giuseppe! He is funny, knowledgeable, full of energy, and a fantastic guide to the area. I also greatly appreciated his flexibility with our schedule, allowing us to end the day with more than two hours spent in Positano (a reverse of the typical schedule). Grazie Millie to Giuseppe for the great day! Highly recommend him to anyone visiting the area!

sources.shortName: The 7 Most Romantic Spots in Sorrento for Couples

places.name: La Marinella

reviews.text: Simply wonderful. We were turned away from Coku hoping for a birthday meal for my wife (hadn't realised needed to book) and instead walked down the steps/tunnel to La Marinella and were one of just 5 tables served for the evening with delicious seafood, beautifully presented, tasty menu 'amuse-bouche' between courses, and with delightful service. And to top it all am exquisite sunset. Really recommend this spot. Definitely worth the walk down and back up!

Loved this place. Outstanding service - 5th Generation business and the new kid on the block - Francesco only 25 is doing a magnificent job by providing hands on legendary customer service. We will be back

What a beautiful location. Walk down  the steps to the small beach and pontoons. Good food and drinks at reasonable prices in an excellent setting. Book your lounger and enjoy the beautiful setting with great and good wine. I fully recommend a full day at La Marinella 🍹😎☀️

places.address: Spiaggia San Francesco, Piazzetta Marinella, 12, 80065 Sant'Agnello NA, Italy

places.generalDescription: Le Muse Suite is a charming family-owned gem that promises an unforgettable stay in Sorrento. Guests rave about the warm hospitality of Bruno and his family, who go above and beyond to ensure your visit is seamless. From securing prime restaurant reservations to offering personalized recommendations for day trips, their dedication shines through.

sources.snippet: The food at the hotel is also top notch, whether it's the delicious fresh breakfast at Le Muse Restaurant, with its floor-to celing windows overlooking Sorrento Bay, or a romantic meal on the terrace of the Restaurant Ambassador  with its killer views.
sources.shortName: The Best Travel Tips For a Romantic Break in Sorrento

places.name: Le Muse Suite

reviews.text: Cristine and Le Muse are absolute gems. She's super nice and accommodating, delivers breakfast every morning on your schedule. The location is perfect, 2 minute walk from the bus/train terminal and only about 5 minutes from a main town center. We were able to walk everywhere we wanted. The rooms are extremely well kept and spacious for 2. Would stay here every time we visit Sorrento if we could.

Highly recommend.  Family that cares for you is thoughtful & considerate, and wants you to have the best experience while as a guest.  Fantastic location close to central area of Sorrento. Very walkable. You won't leave disappointed if you chose to stay here.
We loved our stay, it's quite convenient and close to the center of Sorrento. Cristina is very kind, I loved it!

places.address: Via degli Aranci, 77, 80067 Sorrento NA, Italy
